description.narrative:
Economy wide effects: The Project is expected to support the development of the electronics value chain and contribute to the local economy through increased exports.
Employment: The Project expects to create about 40,000 direct jobs along with skill training opportunities in the local markets, thus establishing a sizeable talent pool for future development of the local industry. Almost all employees of the Project are expected to be hired locally with female employment as a priority. All of them are expected to undergo professional training conducted by senior engineers and technicians of Goertek.
Integration: The Project will help a major player in the global electronics value chain to expand into other emerging market, help to formalize the local electronics manufacturing sector up to export standards and enhance the local supply chain linkages. The know-how and expertise will be transferred at a scale needed to jumpstart other competitive manufacturing and supporting industries in the region. Its high E&S standards and production efficiency will also have market-wide demonstration effects and benefit other local players.
Competitiveness: The Project will develop two full-fledged production sites in Vietnam for localized manufacturing of complicated smart devices and spur the competitiveness and growing innovation in the local economy. It will also facilitate the development of supporting industries by procuring more inputs from local suppliers in Vietnam and build up their capacity to support manufacturing with higher value-add.

The proposed investment is a total of US$700 million senior loans, including IFC A plus B loans, to two Vietnam subsidiaries of Goertek Inc. (Goertek, the Sponsor or the Guarantor) for (i) the expansion of an existing production base in Bac Ninh, Vietnam and (ii) the construction of a new production base in Nghe An, Vietnam (together, the Project). Goertek Technology Vina Company Limited (Goertek Bac Ninh) will undertake the expansion in Bac Ninh and Goertek Precision Industry Vietnam Company Limited (Goertek Nghe An) will construct the greenfield in Nghe An (together Goertek Vietnam, the Companies or the Borrowers).
